login__error: Note, if you have forgotten your username, go to your mailbox, we have addressed you directly with the username.
forgotPassword__success: Thank you. We have sent you an email with instructions on how to reset your password. Please check your inbox, including your spam folder, and follow the instructions in the email.
resetPassword__success: Thank you. Your password has been reset successfully. You can log in now.
adminLandingPage__textCredit2: . Please charge to create or upload listings.
admin__subscriptionsText1: Stay informed when listings you follow are updated. New listings from users are also displayed here.
admin__subscriptionsText2: You do not follow any advertisements yet
adModal__premium: Set ad to Premium for the day - 30 Credits
admModal__first: Move ad to the top of the list - 5 Credits
adForm1__textType: Here you can decide whether it is an erotic advertisement of any kind or an Onlyfans advertisement. The prerequisite for the Onlyfans ad is that you already have an Onlyfans account. You can then add your Onlyfans link to the ad and customers can go directly to your Onlyfans profile.
adForm1__textRubric: First rubric free, additional rubrics + 10 credits
adForm1__textRegion: First region free, additional regions + 10 credits
adForm2__contactDataText: First rubric free, additional rubrics + 10 credits
adForm3__picturesText: You can upload up to 8 listings images.
adForm3__videosText: Videos give customers a better insight into your services. Show yourself in the best light!
adForm3__verificationText1: If you would like to verify your listing, you can upload an image here with the following instructions. We will check your images for authenticity and if it matches the verification image, your listing will be verified. Verification increases your exposure and your ad will be marked with verification.
adForm3__verificationText2: Increase the chances of contact by verifying the authenticity of your images.
adForm3__verificationText3: 1. Write "onlyfriends and code below" on a piece of paper
adForm3__verificationText4: 2. Take a photo of yourself and the sheet of paper
adForm3__verificationText6: This picture will not be published
popUp__twint2: using the QR code above. Once the transfer is successful, you will be redirected.
popUp__twint3: IMPORTANT: Please enter your username or email address in the contact form.
